___SuspendedJobs.description: The number of suspended jobs submitted through Grid or non-Grid interfaces

___EstimatedWorstWaitingTime.description: An estimate of the worst-case time a job will wait before it starts to execute (seconds)

___ServingState.description: How the Share is currently serving jobs

___FreeSlotsWithDuration.description: The number of slots which are currently available for use and how long they are available

___MaxVirtualMemory.description: The maximum amount memory (RAM+swap) that a job can use (MB)

___MaxMultiSlotWallTime.description: The maximum wall clock time that a multi-slot job can run (seconds)

___DefaultCPUTime.description: The default CPU time limit assumed by the LRMS if a maximum time is not specified (seconds)

___RequestedSlots.description: The number of slots needd to execute all waiting and staging jobs

___LocalRunningJobs.description: The number of running jobs submitted using non-Grid interfaces

___MaxWaitingJobs.description: The maximum number of jobs that can be waiting in this Share

___ReservationPolicy.description: The policy used for advance reservation - ReservationPolicy_t

___MaxWallTime.description: The maximum wall clock time that a single-slot job can run (seconds)

___PreLRMSWaitingJobs.description: The number of Grid jobs which have not yet been passed to the LRMS

___FreeSlots.description: The number of slots which are currently available for use

___MaxStageOutStreams.description: The maximum number of streams available to stage files out

___LocalSuspendedJobs.description: The number of suspended jobs submitted using non-Grid interfaces

___MaxSlotsPerJob.description: The maximum number of slots that can be allocated to a single job in this Share

___UsedSlots.description: The number of slots currently in use

___DefaultStorageServiceID.description: The ID of the default StorageService used to store files

___GuaranteedVirtualMemory.description: The amount of memory (RAM+swap) that a job will have available (MB)

___Preemption.description: Whether jobs can be preempted and resumed (no value implies undefined in ExtendedBoolean_t)

___DefaultWallTime.description: The default wall clock per slot assumed by the LRMS if a maximum time is not specified (seconds)

___GuaranteedMainMemory.description: The amount of physical RAM that a job will have available (MB)

___MaxMainMemory.description: The maximum amount of physical RAM that a job can use (MB)

___EstimatedAverageWaitingTime.description: An estimate of the average time a job will wait before it starts to execute (seconds)

___ScheduingPolicy.description: The scheduling policy used by the share - SchedulingPolicy_t (open enumeration)

___MaxUserRunningJobs.description: The maximum number of jobs that can be running in this Share per user

___MaxPreLRMSWaitingJobs.description: The maximum number of jobs that can be waiting in the Grid layer for this Share

___MaxCPUTime.description: The maximum pre-slot CPU time that a job can request (seconds)

___MaxDiskSpace.description: The maximum disk space that a job can use in the working area (GB)

___TotalJobs.description: The total number of jobs in any state

___MinCPUTime.description: The minimum pre-slot CPU time that a job can request (seconds)

___RunningJobs.description: The number of running jobs submitted through Grid or non-Grid interfaces

___StagingJobs.description: The number of jobs staging files before or after execution

___MaxRunningJobs.description: The maximum number of jobs that can be running in this Share

___MaxTotalCPUTime.description: The maximum amount of CPU time that a job can request across all slots assigned to it (seconds)

___WaitingJobs.description: The number of waiting jobs submitted through Grid or non-Grid interfaces

___MaxTotalJobs.description: The maximum number of jobs that can be in this Share

___MappingQueue.description: The name of the queue in the LRMS where jobs in this share are submitted

___LocalWaitingJobs.description: The number of waiting jobs submitted using non-Grid interfaces

___MaxStageInStreams.description: The maximum number of streams available to stage files in
